JMPIMMNC.name: JMPIMMNC
JMPIMMNC.description: Jump to given address if carry flag is not set

JMPIMMTC.name: JMPIMMTC
JMPIMMTC.description: Jump to address from \( \texttt{REG_TMP} \) if carry flag is set

JMPIMMTNC.name: JMPIMMTNC
JMPIMMTNC.description: Jump to address from \( \texttt{REG_TMP} \) if carry flag is not set

JMPIMMO.name: JMPIMMO
JMPIMMO.description: Jump to given address if overflow flag is set

JMPIMMNO.name: JMPIMMNO
JMPIMMNO.description: Jump to given address if overflow flag is not set

JMPIMMTO.name: JMPIMMTO
JMPIMMTO.description: Jump to address from \( \texttt{REG_TMP} \) if overflow flag is set

JMPIMMTNO.name: JMPIMMTNO
JMPIMMTNO.description: Jump to address from \( \texttt{REG_TMP} \) if overflow flag is not set

JMPREL.name: JMPREL
JMPREL.description: Jump to address with given offset from current address

JMPRELS.name: JMPRELS
JMPRELS.description: Jump to address with given offset if sign flag is set

JMPRELNS.name: JMPRELNS
JMPRELNS.description: Jump to address with given offset if sign flag is not set

JMPRELTLS.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if sign flag is set

JMPRELTLNS.name: JMPRELTLNS
JMPRELTLNS.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if sign flag is not set

JMPRELP.name: JMPRELP
JMPRELP.description: Jump to address with given offset if parity flag is set

JMPRELNP.name: JMPRELNP
JMPRELNP.description: Jump to address with given offset if parity flag is not set

JMPRELTLP.name: JMPRELTLP
JMPRELTLP.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if parity flag is set

JMPRELTLNP.name: JMPRELTLNP
JMPRELTLNP.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if parity flag is not set

JMPRELZ.name: JMPRELZ
JMPRELZ.description: Jump to address with given offset if zero flag is set

JMPRELNZ.name: JMPRELNZ
JMPRELNZ.description: Jump to address with given offset if zero flag is not set

JMPRELTLZ.name: JMPRELTLZ
JMPRELTLZ.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if zero flag is set

JMPRELTLNZ.name: JMPRELTLNZ
JMPRELTLNZ.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if zero flag is not set

JMPRELC.description: Jump to address with given offset if carry flag is set

JMPRELNC.name: JMPRELNC
JMPRELNC.description: Jump to address with given offset if carry flag is not set

JMPRELTLC.name: JMPRELTLC
JMPRELTLC.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if carry flag is set

JMPRELTLNC.name: JMPRELTLNC
JMPRELTLNC.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if carry flag is not set

JMPRELO.name: JMPRELO
JMPRELO.description: Jump to address with given offset if overflow flag is set

JMPRELNO.name: JMPRELNO
JMPRELNO.description: Jump to address with given offset if overflow flag is not set

JMPRELTLO.name: JMPRELTLO
JMPRELTLO.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if overflow flag is set

JMPRELTLNO.description: Jump to address with given offset from \( \texttt{REG_TMPL} \) if overflow flag is not set

JMPFUN.name: JMPFUN
JMPFUN.description: Push \( \texttt{PC} \) to stack and jump to given address

JMPRET.name: JMPRET
JMPRET.description: Pop address from stack and jump to it

PUSHABS.name: PUSHABS
PUSHABS.description: Push value from given address to stack

PUSHABSZP.name: PUSHABSZP
PUSHABSZP.description: Push value from given zero page address to stack

POPMEM.name: POPMEM
POPMEM.description: Pop value from stack to memory at given address

POPMEMZP.name: POPMEMZP
POPMEMZP.description: Pop value from stack to zero page memory at given address
